metadata.title: CVE-2019-7147 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A buffer over-read exists in the function crc64ib in crc64.c in nasmlib in Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc16. A crafted asm input can cause segmentation faults, leading to denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: nasm package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-04-25').
